meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ruthless.
meanings.sent1: Her ruthlessnesses in the competition surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The dictator's ruthlessnesses towards his enemies were well-known.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her ruthlessnesses in the game made her a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent4: The ruthlessnesses of the storm left a path of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The villain's ruthlessnesses were depicted vividly in the movie, leaving a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.sent1: Witnessing the ruthlessnesses of the hunter was unsettling.
meanings.sent2: His ruthlessnesses in business negotiations earned him a reputation.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its ruthlessnesses by catching multiple mice in one night.
meanings.sent4: The ruthlessnesses of time spare no one, aging everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's ruthlessnesses in battle were unmatched, striking fear into the enemy.
